website_summaries.verdict: GE's Alexa lamp is a good idea and it works well, but it costs a little too much for our tastes.
pros: The Sol is a surprisingly likable lamp with a distinctive design and the full capabilities of Amazon's Alexa
It even gives her a couple of extra tricks that you won't get with other Alexa devices, like visual timer countdowns
cons: The lamp feels a bit plasticky, it can't call other Alexa devices like the Echo can and it doesn't include Amazon's ESP feature, which is important if you want a lot of Alexa devices in your home

customer_reviews.title: Almost, but not there..
customer_reviews.text: Guess they are trying to get rid of these because they retail for way more than the $32 I paid for them (picked up two). As an Alexa enabled smart lamp they are fine. Wish they were full RGB rather than shades of white. But they are bright. Now as an actual Alexa device(echo) there are some major drawbacks. .cannot be named anything other than Alexa .mics are not that good at hearing you .does not support near field recognition Overall if they would have kept up support or added the above, they would fit well in a smarthome ecosystem that has other echo units in the room. So you'd want them to be standalone
customer_reviews.author: Antoine

customer_reviews.title: Alexa integration is slow and low-quality. Lamp malfunctions frequently.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I first discovered this product but, after buying it, I regret it. The Alexa integration is so slow and poor-quality that it renders the feature practically useless. The light itself is nice but you can get ring lights like this - without poor-quality Alexa integration - for far less money. Save yourself the hassle and get a cheaper light along with an Echo Dot and you'll be much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Downey

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be used in the same room with another
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use these as bedside table clocks and lights. Unfortunately you cannot change the name from Alexa to something else like other Amazon devices. So when you tried to wake up the clock on the left side it would also wake up the other one and they would get out of sync and be messed up. You can't use two in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: FatRat400

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Sol today to use next to my bed as I need it for my waking and bedtime routines. Setup took a couple tries but I followed the direction and it finally worked; took me about 10 minutes. After setup, everything else is a piece of cake if you follow the directions. Love how simple it is to use the voice activation (dim the light, turn on music, ask about the weather, set alarm, etc). The light quality is perfect and I love how you can customize the intensity by small increments. Love this so much I’m planning to by two more for each of my kids rooms!
customer_reviews.author: Avesmom

customer_reviews.title: EVERY HOME IN AMERICA MUST HAVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG... PEOPLE PLEASE IGNORE ALL THE 1 STARS & 2 STARS ETC... THIS IS A SEXY,ROMANTIC, & CALMING... I PURCHASED MINES OFF "OFFERUP" FROM A SELLER... AT FIRST I WAS SKEPTICAL... BUT LET ME TELL YOU!!! IM BUYING LOTS OF THESE... GREAT FOR LOUNGES. RESTAURANTS. CHURCHES. PARTIES ETC... OK.. IF YA'LL HAVING PROBLEMS GETTING THIS TO WORK... GET IN TOUCH WITH ME.. DJ PAPARAZZI BKLYN,NY ... bernardebankz@yahoo.com Ps. No worries, I'm an electronic geek!!! Lol ,,,,PEOPLE USUALLY GIVE BAD REVIEWS WHENEVER THEY CAN'T FIGURE THINGS OUT,, LOL....
customer_reviews.author: DJ  PAPARAZZI...bkly ny

customer_reviews.title: Yes...just not yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beutiful Alexa device on the market. Stunning. Georgeous. Classy. Here’s the rub: Alexa is awful on the Sol. Plain awful. Used to smoothly conversing with Alexa? Get ready for a pause long enough for you to think Alexa took a vacation. I should have timed it before returning, but I’m guessing somewhere in the range of five additional seconds to get a response. Shame GE put out such a well designed product that works so poorly. If there was an option to purchase this device without Alexa, I would do it and duct tape a Dot on the side. It would net out way better. I’ll be one of the first to buy the second version!
customer_reviews.author: Cabel Rich

customer_reviews.title: The next generation will be better. Worth $40
customer_reviews.text: I would like it to be brighter but toward the rear of the device. It would also be nice to have a physical button to change the color temperature. The all is sub par so it shouldn’t be the only option to do this. I also wish there were holes to mount it on the wall or ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't contain all the functions of Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Works well, looks great, however not all Alexa functionally is present. Can play multi room music. Had to keep my old dot in the bedroom and mute it's microphone so I can use this function with all my other echos and dots. Can't call or message either. Other than that great device, but unless GE updates the Sol to work with all Alexa functions and your looking to do what I did and replace a lamp and a dot, my suggestion is to either wait and see if GE gets it right or go another route. Now if you don't care about all the functions, then it is a cool device and really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Salyer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Sending back. Feels cheap, really does nothing Alexa/Echo doesn’t do on its own. Interesting look and hella brite! But I got two and I never even opened the second one. I was like what’s the point really? I guess if you don’t have Alexa it’s more advantageous but even then you’re better off now that Echo is down in price to get that. This should be $59 tops. Mine are in the foyer and ready for return, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Lamp, Gen 1 Alexa though
customer_reviews.text: Sure wish Google would make one of these. Will not set up on Obama phones, so I finally got a real one and set up easy. I am keeping this lamp on mute as the newer Alexas do more but controlling it through my new Phone. Also, the voice stuff works to control the lamp brightness or Offs and Ons using it on mute with the others listening. Would buy again, but never for original price. Trump 2020.
customer_reviews.author: ATXsteve

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! It provides a different shades (dimming) and different tones (white shades) as well. I was able to use the lamp with the built in Alexa as well as my Google home. However, the Alexa can control the tones of the light while Google and can only dim. The clock on the unit look awesome, so much so, that I bought a second one. The only problem I had was the "C by GE" app was a little bit of a pain; especially if you need to reinstall the lamp and bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Camp

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not useful
customer_reviews.text: I love the ecstatic of the lamp, not loving the lack of control with Alexa. Seems I have to go into the GE to control more than th on/off/dim features. Not as bright as I would have liked it to be. I thought I may be able to use it on my end table for reading, but it does not cast light well enough for that. Though I was able to set up my whole house with the Hue bulbs with no issues, I had to call GE tech support go help with this install and had a VERY hard time understanding the rep. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Denis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing appliance ! Try it and you will love it. GE has a winner here
customer_reviews.author: S. L.

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: This mostly does what it's supposed to, but for the price, it should do it a whole lot better. The lamp and clock function are cool, but the Alexa functionality and experience falls well short of what you were would expect. At this price point there are much better options available with much greater functionality. If you want an okay lamp that makes a cool conversation piece then feel free to buy it. If you want a truly seamless smart lamp Alexa experience, look elsewhere. Hope this helps... Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Siege

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lamp with deeply flawed software
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic lamp with deeply flawed software. Unfortunately, setup was so broken that I had to return the lamp. The lamp itself was great but requires the software to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Follow Directions carefully and this Ring light will work
customer_reviews.text: At first I had a hard time getting this to connect to my wifi, then I realized I was trying to connect thur my Bluetooth. After turning off my Bluetooth and then clearing out my wifi I did a rescan and the sol wifi came up. I then return to the CbyGE app. Go to add new CBy GE device by clicking on the 3dots in the upper right hand corner, then click on sol and follow the directions from there. Make sure your wifi setting is still on the GEsolXXXX settings or else it won't work
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Simply "Do not Buy"
customer_reviews.text: The product is nothing more than a paper weight. First, the headache of initial connecting with your wireless router. Then the countless reconnecting because it will not reconnect on its own if there's a power failure. Finally, apparently, there is an unsolvable issue with 5Ghz wireless connections--meaning the SOL will only work with 2.4Ghz. In other words, if your wireless router is dual-band, 2.4-5Ghz (which all modern routers are) then you're "SOL" with your SOL!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Hadid

customer_reviews.title: Colossal waste
customer_reviews.text: I’ve spent 99.9999% of the time since receiving this, months ago, setting, resetting and resetting again, all to no avail. Colossal waste
customer_reviews.author: mumtimesfour

customer_reviews.title: Device won't connect to WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I just got my GE SOL today. The light works great but it won't connect to my wifi. I contacted the help desk and they just took my email and said they would contact me if they find a solution. So basically I spent $150.00 on a lamp that can't setup Alexa! Complete waste of money and the company offered no help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has Alexa.....but
customer_reviews.text: Alexa can't turn on and turn off the lamp. You have to use the app... maybe mine was defective but it doesn't make sense to have a voice assistant be able to control other lights in my house and not the one its built into. I had to reset it 4-5 times and the app would freeze alot. Very little support online. Had to return. Just got an Echo Plus and I'm using it with my hue bulbs. Problem solved and better sound.
customer_reviews.author: Diego L Morales

customer_reviews.title: I also love the wi-if outlets that connect to Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Loving my Sol! I have bought a total of 3 of them. I also love the wi-if outlets that connect to Alexa! They are a great addition to my Sol’s as I can tell Alexa to turn on & off the lights without fumbling for the light switch. I also don’t have to leave a light on overnight. I can tell Alexa to turn on the kitchen light and it’s on when I get downstairs! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly P.

customer_reviews.title: App doesn’t have great functionality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 25 bucks or so, and honestly I don’t think I would buy it again. It barely works as it should - it won’t connect to the native app half of the time, and the other half it works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to like this lamp and it had been great. Then 3 weeks ago Alexa updated and now we are unable to connect to the internet. Customer service at GE couldn’t fix it, and the mobile app is obsolete.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Smart, eye-catching, functional.
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant. Terrific range of light temperatures from very warm to daylight cool. The built in Alexa is very convenient, even though it was a little slow to respond when I first used it but now it's much better after a recent firmware update. It's a conversation piece, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Xman

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Poor execution on the back end.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp and I love the alexa connectivity but the big ding that I have to give it is the app. Its a literal pain to work with. In the app store it gets like 1.5 stars. Theres a reason for that.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Heimerdinger

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised and it's fun.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an adjustable (warmth and brilliance) office light and Sol by GE does it all exactly as advertised. Plus, Alexa is fun to have around. The software installation is not the easiest in the world; but once I got over that hurdle, Sol was everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: eclecticist

customer_reviews.title: Great Stylish Light that Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty neat light! Im glad I purchased it when the price was lower. I use it as a soft light in my kitchen, and leave on through the night for my puppy. I like the timing and clock features, and being to control it from anywhere via the app.
customer_reviews.author: Diyanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on Kelly and Ryan. Had to have it. Works flawlessly with Alexa. Easy set up. Dimmng capability is awesome. Haven’t used the lighted clock feature because it’s so bright. Just tell Alexa to turn on Lamp (or whatever you’ve named it) and it lights up the room. Great product, unique design. Alexa is, of course, fun and informative.
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow S. Webster

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are beautiful, but are no longer functional. GE discontinued supporting the updates and software for this product. I will never buy or recommend any products from GE lightings. GE lost my trust.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaldo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unit would not pair to my home WI-FI, spent 1/2 day with GE Tech support with no resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander W.

customer_reviews.title: it was not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The light is very unique! It still has some bugs to work out with connecting to wifi and the app. The directions make it seem so simple, but with the applications not working properly from the start, it was not easy to use. Overall, we are happy with it. But would have preferred if it worked better based on the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvements
customer_reviews.text: Alexa does not know how to pronounce Sol so is difficult to give commands, the set up is a bit troublesome and the light is too bright even dimmed at 11% Made the mistake to buy this lamp for my bedroom and the clock feature even though really cool is too bright for sleep time! Not sure if I can turn off the clock feature will try to find out today in a chat!
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo Roman

customer_reviews.title: Coolest lamp I ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This Lamp is awesome Design I perfect and matches my desk setup nicely it does stumble on your request slightly but it’s not a take away in my book looking to buy another one soon love it
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The fact is it's a cool device to have
customer_reviews.text: The fact is it's a cool device to have. It's something for those who want to show off their room or house a bit more. It's missing Bluetooth though, big letdown. I think it needs a motion sensor application to make it shine. All in all I recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: No longer supported by Apple Devices - iPhones, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Product simply stopped supporting Apple iOS and gave no notice to consumers. I now have a worthless lamp! Thanks GE. That's really great service.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy tech wise.
customer_reviews.text: Product does not last long. Got one for me and one one as a gift, neither made it for over a year. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matsuman

customer_reviews.title: love the idea
customer_reviews.text: Unique product.love the idea.and the best coustmer care service.works great and perfectly but the Bluetooth option is not yet added.hope the update is gona be soon. if those updates are not gonna get you the sol as a normal alexa its better to buy a $50 echo from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: amalbaby

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! I told my mother to say "Alexa turn on SOL" when she walks into my house at night when I am out of town, to take care of things. She loved it so much she ordered one for herself.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wow....Amazing....
customer_reviews.text: Ive just recieved today in the UK.....Cant praise this light enough.....looks amazing...everything works how it should....through the smartphone app and via Alexa voice control....all I can say....is well done GE lighting....amazing job....
customer_reviews.author: jeffers g

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY !
customer_reviews.text: I usually never write reviews but this has to be the worst product I’ve ever purchased. They sent me two of them and either one of them would connect to my phone. The set up processes is impossible, I didn’t listen to the reviews and I purchased it. I got my money back , however it’s a waste of time .
customer_reviews.author: Deandre Ware

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Regret Ever
customer_reviews.text: Originally I Loved the look of this light and the idea of having a smart light but the automations don’t work. When it’s set to turn on in the am it comes on at midnight. Spent over two months talking to tech support and got nothing achieved. Now it’s basically a really expensive clock.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Burnett

customer_reviews.title: No bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Beware this product does not have Bluetooth to use a headphone with it. The voice recognition is a lot worse that an echo dot. The clock lights are not dimmable at night too bright. Does not recognize when another echo turns on but just blabs over it. Very disappointed. Bought two and returning both.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D'Amico

customer_reviews.title: need three apps to installl  NOT EASY,,,,,, ALEXA app was extremely hard
customer_reviews.text: Two days ( about 2 1/2 hours each day ) on the phone trying to set it up...HARD to dim ..only 5 settings..Never could get it to link with GOOGLE . Not worth the trouble for a COOL looking light, can not play music except Amazon. Just not worth it. Returned the second day after unboxing.
customer_reviews.author: Pam V.

customer_reviews.title: Good for its purposes.
customer_reviews.text: Decent lamp, needs to have a dim option for the clock, but the rest of the capabilities more than make up for that.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Tyler Loeffler

customer_reviews.title: Won’t link for automation
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. After linking skills to C by GE, it does not appear in discoverable devices. Called GE and they were absolutely helpless. I should’ve read the rest of the reviews before purchasing, would avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing!!!! I love this lamp!! And Alexa respond very well to all our demands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This product is just gorgeous in every way. Would recommend it to anyone. Lighting is beautiful. After the Alexa update, the response time is also very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Broken From Updates
customer_reviews.text: This lamp worked great with Alexa when I first bought it, but as it kept getting updated, it became less functional until the last update when it finally stopped working with Alexa AND the C by GE app. This would be the perfect lamp if it was still functioning correctly.
customer_reviews.author: gary t.

customer_reviews.title: Although it was a cool concept.
customer_reviews.text: Although it was a cool concept ..... on this one Alexa’s response are very delayed and she often doesn’t hear or understand you. Using the two apps is confusing too. Not sure which app I’m supppsed to use ???
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp but needs RGB features.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp and how it gives my room a nice futuristic look. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star rating is because the light doesn't have RGB function.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Perez

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: The house is pretty much alexafied.but I cannot connect this unit to Alexa... What a waste
customer_reviews.author: cecenio jude escano

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered this and found out when it was already shipped, but I still use it and the features are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp but no support for calling
customer_reviews.text: Great unit but no support for calling so I have to take some points off
customer_reviews.author: Jsalz1

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Working well, but I can’t turn off the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Jiakang

customer_reviews.title: Not to change passwords or internet service
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are great but if you change password on internet it is difficult to hook them back up I am still unable to reset and hook them back up
customer_reviews.author: Casey house

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I thought it would be. Doesn’t connect with my echo. Has trouble with some commands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It is a piece of junk. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: ralph w loeffler

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all. Slow response to commands. Turns on and off randomly without addressing Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Muraczewski

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Android app. Have tried to connect and pair it to my Alexa account but the app won't connect to the Sol once it's on my home network. It had great potential :( UPDATE: Tried one last time to connect before boxing it up - and it connected! Works just like my Echo, with added visuals. However, The clock is way off - and not related to time zones either. I sent an email to GE for support and I'll update the review when/if I hear back from them.
customer_reviews.author: PicassoPC

customer_reviews.title: I can't seem to get it to turn on or ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to get it to turn on or off using alexa voice control. In the Alexa app it only lets me turn it on or off, not dim. You have to orient the thing to the angle you will view it, from the backside the clock is backwards. If you read the review, I would save my money for something else.
customer_reviews.author: mtcat

customer_reviews.title: however the new one I received was only marginally better. Please be cautious when buying this product
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ever felt the need to leave a review. As an owner of an Amazon Echo who uses my Echo daily, I was excited to have an Alexa Sol however I was greatly disappointing. It is basically an overpriced lamp. I practically have to scream to be heard and even then it only works when it wants to. It is also constantly disconnects from my home wifi. This is my second Alexa sol since the first one came defective and extremely slow, however the new one I received was only marginally better. Please be cautious when buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer help / support at GE CbyHelp.com
customer_reviews.text: Works great, Great GE help staff, I needed the power supply for this , the GE support people got me the part very quick, do not see this level of customer support very often these days. I would highly recommend this product. Any issue with it and you certainly can count on GE support to help you out promptly. Special thanks to Shielena at GE, CbyGEHelp.com.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: It just a old school step up like setup a security camera
customer_reviews.text: Follow directions step by step. It just a old school step up like setup a security camera. But make sure you go to Alexa to link the SOL. One thing about the light. No switch to change color temperature on the unit itself beside using Alexa

customer_reviews.title: ... an echo & dot thought this would be a great addition really disappointed this unit is not as receptive ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an echo & dot thought this would be a great addition really disappointed this unit is not as receptive as my other two when I give the commands it doesn’t always heed them and I have to unplug it at night as it starts playing music without any commands.
customer_reviews.author: Billie F.

customer_reviews.title: one star
customer_reviews.text: great i like my light this app for Iphone is not working no i dont recomendate to no one this is waste of money i have this
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Unique concept and I tried everything to get it to connect to Alexa following the instructions perfectly and it just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fischer

customer_reviews.title: A fun product to have around
customer_reviews.text: A fun product to have around! If you have a space that needs a little light, and sound for that matter, this is a nice gadget. Alexa enabled, and works fairly well but requires frequent updates.
customer_reviews.author: PRK1983

customer_reviews.title: Set up easy. Fit right into my multi Alexa/dot/tplink household
customer_reviews.text: Set up easy. Fit right into my multi Alexa/dot/tplink household, Nice clock. Amusing,but hard to read by, Nice ambient lighting. Would prefer less plastic in the frame.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: its like a retarded alexa in a lamp
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect a full echo product from this lamp.its like a retarded alexa in a lamp. It cant use the call function or control my light switches.total waist of space.
customer_reviews.author: ian hunt

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it's talks without being asked a question
customer_reviews.text: It really looks cool but occasionally it just starts talking by itself. Which is really strange. I have to turn off the microphone
customer_reviews.author: Lionel A Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Ge Lighting C by GE Sol Wifi has greatly exceeded ...
customer_reviews.text: Ge Lighting C by GE Sol Wifi has greatly exceeded my expectations. It is significantly bigger then I had initially realized and the brightness produced from the lamp is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bishkin

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service on GE's part
customer_reviews.text: All issues fixed. Great customer service on GE's part! Solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sol is Everything 💡
customer_reviews.text: Great product! All my light bulbs are C by GE and controlled my the app. Never felt I needed an Echo but when I saw the release of the Sol, I knew I needed to have it. Easy set up and now I'm receiving my flash briefings and weather and much more 💡.
customer_reviews.author: Jackelyn Valladares

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to set this on my cell phone I read everything and install ithe app but still does not respond
customer_reviews.author: Melita Sacro

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: We cannot get it to work by talking to it which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaG

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. It does our grocery list. I’m ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. It does our grocery list. I’m not very techno, so that’s about all she does for us. It can’t dim itself yet. I’ve gotta get a smarter house hooked up first.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: And the product over all sucks. I would return it but it’s too late
customer_reviews.text: When I revived it the box was already opened. The lamp was very dusty. It came with instructions that weren’t Tm for the lamp I purchased. The pox it was shipped looked very beat up. And the product over all sucks. I would return it but it’s too late. The reaction time when you say Alexa is longer than any other echo device. She doesn’t understand properly. She turns on even if we aren’t speaking to her. At the begging Alexa’s voice was very staticky still does it sometimes. And when you use the buttons on it the reaction is very delayed. Can’t use all the features like on a regular school device. It sucks !!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: I will not buy this
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised that even though Amazon Alexa is built in this lamp we can not control the lamp through Alexa even we cannot switch on / off through Alexa commands GE must look this matter seriously
customer_reviews.author: mahesh shukla

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I was able to purchase it from australia and delivered but i can't download the app for voice control
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Got it today and it doesn’t work straight out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and it doesn’t work straight out of the box. Customer service says it’s apples problem with iOS 11?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Cannady

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed how incompatible the app is with different wifi systems
customer_reviews.text: This device won't work with college campus wifi.... Very disappointed how incompatible the app is with different wifi systems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light itself is really bright and nice though
customer_reviews.text: Have to call costumer support to set it up cause my android won't connect to it. The light itself is really bright and nice though
customer_reviews.author: Danny Otis

product_meta.title: GE C by GE Sol Wifi Connected Smart Light Fixture works with Amazon Alexa
product_meta.description: Sol is an all-in-one smart light that has the features, functionality, and voice control of Amazon Alexa. The industry’s first lighting product with Amazon Alexa built in, Sol is part of GE Lighting’s vision to unleash the power of your home, enabling you and your home to do more. Long Lasting. Use the Sengled mobile App or smart hub panel for dimming. Color Temp (k) -6500k.
feature_bullets: AMAZON ALEXA ENABLED: Featuring the functionality of a standalone Alexa device, C by GE Sol with Amazon Alexa is wifi connected and allows you to use your voice to control lighting features, set timers, check the weather, tell time, and play music from your Alexa enabled music library

EXCLUSIVE FEATURES: More than a smart light, Sol features visual cues for clocks and timers, manual and automated light temperature variation that allows users to select the perfect hue to fit a mood or to ensure a smooth sleep cycle

SMART LAMP FOR ANY ROOM: A perfect lighting solution for the office, the bedroom, the kitchen or living room. The C by GE Sol is a smart light that enhances the security and convenience of any room through voice control and scheduling via the C by GE app

SMART HOME ECOSYSTEM: As an Alexa enabled device, Sol works seamlessly with a wide range of smart home connected devices and thousands of Alexa skills. Part of the C by GE family, Sol connects directly with other C by GE products such as C-Life and C-Sleep smart light bulbs
SLEEK MODERN DESIGN: The result of solar inspiration, Sol features a sleek design that acts as an aesthetic bridge between functional technology and interior design

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars206 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
